original_title: Central Bank bond scam: Notice issued on ex-CBSL chief Arjuna Mahendran
original_body_lines: The Colombo Magistrate’s Court has issued notice on former Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) Arjuna Mahendran to appear before the court on 25 February 2025 over a case filed by the Bribery Commission pertaining to the controversial bond issue in 2015.
The case has been filed over the alleged misappropriation of bonds causing a loss of over Rs. 10 billion to the government of Sri Lanka in 2015.
Colombo Magistrate Thilina Gamage issued this order today (26) after considering a request made by the Bribery Commission.
